Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: gitbook
Post._content:
##  gitbook

SSR1G700mgitbookgitbook

#### 1. nodejsnpm 

```bash
$ sudo apt install nodejs
$ sudo apt install npm
```
#### 2. gitbook

ubunturoot

```bash
$ sudo npm install gitbook-cli -g
```

#### 3. 

```bash
$ gitbook init
```

`README.md``SUMMARY.md`

`SUMMARY.md`

```
# Summary
* [Introduction](README.md)
  * [](README.md)
```

#### 4. 

`xxxx`gitbook

```bash
$ gitbook serve --port=xxxx
```

#### 5. 



```bash
$ gitbook build
```



#### Tips. SUMMARY.md

`SUMMARY.md``.md``SUMMARY.md`



```python
def generateIndex(dir,depth,root=False,filename = 'SUMMARY.md'):
    def myWalkThrough(dir,depth,fp,filename,root=False):
        #print(filename)
        ls = os.listdir(dir)
        ls.sort()
        readme = 'README.md'
        if not root:
            if readme in ls:
                fp.write(depth+' '+'['+dir.split('/')[-1]+']'+'('+ dir+'/'+ readme +')\n')
                print(depth,'['+dir.split('/')[-1]+']'+'('+ dir+'/'+ readme +')')
            depth = '   ' + depth
        for item in ls:
            if os.path.isfile(dir+'/'+item):
                if os.path.splitext(item)[-1] == '.md':
                    if item == readme and not root:
                        continue
                    if root and item == filename:
                        continue
                    fp.write(depth+' '+'['+ os.path.splitext(item)[0] +']'+'('+dir+'/'+item+')\n')
                    print(depth,'['+ os.path.splitext(item)[0] +']'+'('+dir+'/'+item+')')

        for item in ls:
            if not item.startswith('.') and not item.startswith('_'):
                if os.path.isdir(dir+'/'+item):
                    myWalkThrough(dir+'/'+item,depth,fp,filename)
    with open(filename,'w') as fp:
        fp.write('# '+filename.split('.')[0]+'\n')
        myWalkThrough(dir,depth,fp,filename,root=root)
```
Post.raw:
---

```python
def generateIndex(dir,depth,root=False,filename = 'SUMMARY.md'):
    def myWalkThrough(dir,depth,fp,filename,root=False):
        #print(filename)
        ls = os.listdir(dir)
        ls.sort()
        readme = 'README.md'
        if not root:
            if readme in ls:
                fp.write(depth+' '+'['+dir.split('/')[-1]+']'+'('+ dir+'/'+ readme +')\n')
                print(depth,'['+dir.split('/')[-1]+']'+'('+ dir+'/'+ readme +')')
            depth = '   ' + depth
        for item in ls:
            if os.path.isfile(dir+'/'+item):
                if os.path.splitext(item)[-1] == '.md':
                    if item == readme and not root:
                        continue
                    if root and item == filename:
                        continue
                    fp.write(depth+' '+'['+ os.path.splitext(item)[0] +']'+'('+dir+'/'+item+')\n')
                    print(depth,'['+ os.path.splitext(item)[0] +']'+'('+dir+'/'+item+')')

        for item in ls:
            if not item.startswith('.') and not item.startswith('_'):
                if os.path.isdir(dir+'/'+item):
                    myWalkThrough(dir+'/'+item,depth,fp,filename)
    with open(filename,'w') as fp:
        fp.write('# '+filename.split('.')[0]+'\n')
        myWalkThrough(dir,depth,fp,filename,root=root)
```

Post.title: Apachegitbook
Post._content:
### apachegitbook

###### gitbook serverapacheubuntusevercentosred hat

##### 1.apache

red hatlinuxapacheubuntuapache[](https://ubuntu.com/tutorials/install-and-configure-apache#1-overview) 

```bash
sudo apt update
sudo apt install apache2
```

80ip

![apache defult page](https://ubuntucommunity.s3.dualstack.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/original/2X/7/771159b35c97e429247aac754ad44bf06cc1efa8.png)

##### 2. 

ubuntuapache`/var/www/html ``/var/www/`gitbookhtml

```bash
sudo mkdir /var/www/gitbook
```

##### 3.build gitbookmd`/var/www/gitbook`

```bash
gitbook build [your gitbook path] --output= /var/www/gitbook
```

##### 4. apache

`/etc/apache2/site-avaliable/`

`gitbook.conf`

```
DocumentRoot /var/www/gci/
```

##### 5.apache



```bash
sudo a2ensite gitbook.conf
```

apache

```bash
service apache2 reload
```

##### gitbook

![](https://res.cloudinary.com/afan1996/image/upload/v1597143635/poop_vgin0f.png)

Post.title: hexonginx
Post._content:
gitbookgitbookmarkdownpowered by Hexo

### hexo
Hexo Hexo  Markdown([](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/))markdownnice

### hexo
- hexoNodejsGit(ubunturoot)
```bash
$ sudo apt-get install nodejs
$ sudo apt-get install npm
$ sudo apt-get install git-core
```
- npmHexo
```bash
sudo npm install -g hexo-cli
```

### 
hexo
```bash
$ hexo init <folder>
$ cd <folder>
$ npm install
```
`<folder>`

```bash
$ hexo s
```

![start server](https://res.cloudinary.com/afan1996/image/upload/v1597143448/hexo_test_ud58su.png)
`http://localhost:4000`
![start page](https://res.cloudinary.com/afan1996/image/upload/v1597143439/hexo_defaut_bgd6dz.png)

### 
Hello Worldgitbookhexo
```bash
$ hexo new <post name>#post name post nameurl
```
hexosource_posts`<post name>.md`

```yml
---
title: #<post name>
date: #post
tags: 
---
```
title---markdownTaT

### 
hexosourceimagesmarkdown`/images/<>`

### 
hexo[](https://hexo.io/themes/)github
```bash
$ git clone <git> themes/<>
```
`_connfig.yml`
```yml
# Extensions
## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: <>
```
`hexo s`

### 
`hexo s -p <your port>`
```bash
$ hexo generate
```
publicapachenginxwebhexonginxDjango

### nginx 
nginx`nginx/1.14.0 (Ubuntu)`
nginx
apacheapache80
```bash
$ sudo lsof -iTCP:80
```
commentnginx`kill -9 <PID>`
nginx`/etc/nginx/sites-available``sudo vim default`default

```conf
server {
        listen 80 default_server;
        listen [::]:80 default_server;
        server_name _;

        location / {
                alias /var/www/<yourpath>/;#/var/www/404
                index  index.html index.htm;
                autoindex on;
        }
}
```
`sudo nginx -s restart`
`hexo generate`publicnginx/var/wwwhexo/var/www_config.yml
```yml
# Directory
source_dir: source
public_dir: /var/www/<yourpath> #nginxalias
tag_dir: tags
archive_dir: archives
category_dir: categories
code_dir: downloads/code
i18n_dir: :lang
skip_render:
```
`sudo hexo generate`sudo
post`sudo hexo generate`
